:KitKat::
She couldn't even see Drillbit as he picked her up. She could barely 
hear him as he spoke.  She whisperd to Drilbit. "I..love...you.."
She slipped into unconsiousness.

The CR extracted some of the venom. But not enough in time. She 
whispered from inside the CR,"Drillbit...I...I.." her spark started 
to fluctuate and her body jerked as the venom was taking it's 
complete effect on her spark.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He heard KitKat. He ran to the room in a panic. He found her.
> "Oh my god!" He picked her up, and took her to a CR.
> "Hold on. Dont die on me!"
> He put her in and set it for toxins and vireses. He monetered her
> recovery.
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod saw a pod go by with Diamond. He reconized her.
> "Hot Rod, MAXIMIZE!"
> He transformed, and fired a rocket at it.
> "Now where are you going in such a hurry?"
> 
> ::Demolition::
> 
> With Angel Prime gone, he went to the CR's and started repairing.
